title: 92/147/EEC: Commission Decision of 17 February 1992 amending Decisions 91/146/EEC, 91/281/EEC and 91/282/EEC concerning importations of fishery and aquaculture products from Peru, Ecuador and Colombia
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 17 February 1992  amending Decisions 91/146/EEC, 91/281/EEC and 91/282/EEC concerning importations of fishery and aquaculture products from Peru, Ecuador and Colombia  (92/147/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Article 1 of Decision 91/146/EEC the following words are added:
'and marine fishery products caught by vessels of the Member States and consigned to the territory of the Community from Peru under the customs procedure introduced by Commission Regulation (EEC) No 137/79 (*).
(*) OJ No L 20, 27. 1. 1979, p. 1.'

In Article 1 of Decision 91/281/EEC the following paragraph is added:
'However, the certificate shall not be required for marine fishery products caught by vessels of the Member States and consigned to the territory of the Community from Ecuador under the customs procedure introduced by Commission Regulation (EEC) No  137/79 (*).
(*) OJ No L 20, 27. 1. 1979, p. 1.'

In Article 1 of Decision 91/282/EEC the following paragraph is added:
'However, the certificate shall not be required for marine fishery products caught by vessels of the Member States and consigned to the territory of the Community from Colombia under the customs procedure introduced by Commission Regulation (EEC) No  137/79 (*).
(*) OJ No L 20, 27. 1. 1979, p. 1.'
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 February 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 56. (3) OJ No L 73, 20. 3. 1991, p. 34. (4) OJ No L 294, 25. 10. 1991, p. 51. (5) OJ No L 142, 6. 6. 1991, p. 43. (6) OJ No L 142, 6. 6. 1991, p. 44. (7) OJ No L 20, 27. 1.  1979, p. 1. (8) OJ No L 320, 22. 11. 1991, p. 19.
